abstract: barratt developments plc given average recommendation of `` hold '' by analysts .
article: barratt developments plc has received a consensus recommendation of `` hold '' from the fifteen research firms that are currently covering the stock , marketbeat ratings reports . three investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell recommendation , four have assigned a hold recommendation and eight have given a buy recommendation to the company . the average 1-year price target among analysts that have updated their coverage on the stock in the last year is gbx 663.64 . a number of equities analysts recently weighed in on bdev shares . credit suisse group raised shares of barratt developments to an `` outperform '' rating and upped their target price for the stock from gbx 578 to gbx 702 in a research note on friday , october 6th .

deutsche bank reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating on shares of barratt developments in a research note on tuesday , october 3rd . barclays reduced their target price on shares of barratt developments from gbx 712 to gbx 710 and set an `` overweight '' rating for the company in a research note on monday , october 30th . peel hunt reaffirmed a `` hold '' rating and issued a gbx 635 target price on shares of barratt developments in a research note on wednesday , september 6th . finally , liberum capital reaffirmed a `` sell '' rating and issued a gbx 537 target price on shares of barratt developments in a research note on wednesday , november 15th .

in other barratt developments news , insider steven j. boyes sold 10,000 shares of the stock in a transaction dated friday , october 6th . the shares were sold at an average price of gbx 651 , for a total value of £ 65,100 . also , insider david thomas sold 26,887 shares of the stock in a transaction dated monday , october 9th . the shares were sold at an average price of gbx 653 , for a total transaction of £ 175,572.11 . over the last ninety days , insiders sold 40,997 shares of company stock worth $ 26,919,551 .

shares of barratt developments remained flat at $ gbx 644 during mid-day trading on monday . barratt developments has a 12-month low of gbx 6.26 and a 12-month high of gbx 705.50 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 6,520.00 and a pe ratio of 1,055.74 . trademark violation warning : this piece of content was reported by american banking news and is the property of of american banking news . if you are accessing this piece of content on another domain , it was illegally stolen and republished in violation of u. s. & international copyright and trademark laws .
